title: T201 SGC Graded "Hall of Famers" For Sale
author: iggyman

posts.post_title: T201 SGC Graded "Hall of Famers" For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have the following T201 hall of famers for sale......shipping, handling, bubble envelope and a "Thanks" from me are included in the price.  Paypal or other forms of payment work for me {PICs can be seen at the bottom of the page}.  My email address is [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url]. 

Graded
T201 Ty Cobb / Sam Crawford SGC 10..............................$225
T201 Johnny Evers / Frank Chance SGC 60........................$165
Raw
T201 Johnny Evers / Frank Chance.....................................$75
 (nice front and no creases, but has some glue residue on the back side)

T201 Charles Bender / Oldring............................................$25
(heavy crease in upper right corner and a spot of paper loss on the back side)

Lovely Day...
